author: pottlinger
msg: RAT-201: In case of errors with the given charset fallback to UTF-8.
* In case an invalid encoding is defined via system property we fallback to UTF-8.

author: nick
msg: TIKA-1085 Treat a PDF with a leading Byte Order Mark the same for detection, and add low-priorty matches for the PDF magic coming in 1-1024 bytes of the start (may give false positives if too high), plus tests

author: pottlinger
msg: RAT-201: Add SWF to list of binary files.
* Refactored tests and added equalsIgnoreCase to manifest files.
